topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: Full clouds.yaml Sample File

body.p: For information on what each parameter is, which parameters are required, and where to find values for each parameters, see the complete clouds.yaml documentation or the installation documentation for each service.
In your environment, the clouds.yaml file should be located at ~/.config/openstack/clouds.yaml. If this file does not exist yet, create it.
This sample file serves only as a visual example of what a complete clouds.yaml file should look like when all the sections are together, including proper indentation.

The first section (Platform Configuration) is required by the HDPI and the Application Lifecycle Service. The Application Lifecycle Service does not require an additional section. The Messaging Broker Service has two sections. The Database service and HPE Helion Code Engine have one section each.
